name: Random Image Per Card
author: Yuwa
description: Shows a random image from collection.media/<folder_name> each time a card is shown, with configurable options (question/answer side, size, avoid repeat, folder name).

enabled.description: Enable or disable the random image feature.

show_on_question.description: Show the random image on the question side.

show_on_answer.description: Show the random image on the answer side.

folder_name.description: Subfolder in collection.media where random images are stored.

max_height_vh.description: Maximum image height (vh). Set 0 for no limit.

avoid_repeat.description: Avoid showing the same image twice in a row.
